title: How Sam and Colby Turned Haunted Places into Millions of Views
description: Sam and Colby join the Creator Economics podcast to chat about their success flipping their channel around and taking over the haunted exploration niche. How did they grow their channel while keeping their team lean, how do they earn millions of views on videos that are over an hour long, and what's next for their creator journey?
dc:creator: Reed Duchscher and Blake Robbins
